name: Quadruple Helicopter Friendship
description:
Made for Minijam 15 with the theme Technology and the limitation of using a particular color palette.

EDIT: 1st place winner for Minijam 15 :D

==============================================
Quadruple Helicopter Friendship is about flying  your new quadcopter, that can receive texts from anyone who spots it, and about the friendly messages it receives. 

It's also about doing flips.

But more importantly, it's about one way that technology can help lonely people, distribute humor, and spread good vibes.

---------  CONTROLS!! ---------

- WASD to go forward, backward, and sideways in the direction of the camera.

- Shift to sink, Space to rise.

- Q TO DO SWEET FLIPS

- mouse to look.

==================================================
This game was made using Unity3d, with some help YarnSpinner and Cinemachine. All the models, art, and music were made by me during the 3-day game jam period.

Though this was originally made for a game Jam (my first game jam woo!), I'm considering fleshing this out, adding more interactivity with the town, and maybe (maybe?) publishing it for real. If you'd like to see that happen PLEASE let me now because i am a distractable and fragile thing and i could use the encouragement.

This also isn't my only project, so if you're interested in this,  or anything else indie gamedev-ish, follow me on Twitter. I'd super duper extremely appreciate it <3
